oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Legislative Plaza Looking Down Capitol Boulevard, c.1980s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Legislative Plaza, looking down Captiol Boulevard toward Church Street, circa 1980s. The Sam Davis Hotel is visible in the background. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
